name: Pranks and Greens
writer: Matt Groening (created by), James L. Brooks (developed by), Matt Groening (developed by), Sam Simon (developed by), Jeff Westbrook
actors: Dan Castellaneta, Julie Kavner, Nancy Cartwright, Yeardley Smith
plot: Bart meets the boy responsible for the greatest prank in Springfield Elementary School history, and discovers that he's now a 19-year-old loser. Meanwhile, Marge is scolded for providing unhealthy snacks for Maggie's play group.
